name: Lemon Blast!
description:
It's Lemon time.

Quench your thirst for action as you venture as Lemon Man, a lone lemon on one sole mission: to defeat the vile Lime Gang!

As Lime Boss and his putrid Lime Minions take over the Farm. Lemon Man must jump, shoot, and dash against every obstacle in his way so he can put an end to their rotten plans in this fruity action platformer.
